page.title: 12Pet Survey by R.Doyle.
page.content: We questioned people in Park Road, Oxted about the pets they kept. Park Road is a crescent backing onto farmland. House are mostly detached with large gardens. Few young families live there.{Questions asked were:- 1. How many pets do you have? 2. What are they? 3. Why do you keep them? We gave out 70 forms, 50 were returned {Results were: Without pets 15; with pets 35. With 1 dog 25; more than 1 dog 5. Most popular breed was Labrador. With cats 23; more than 1 cat 6. Fish 9. Rabbits 3. Horses 1. Gerbils 1 Birds 3. One lady kept a bird sanctuary. Tortoises 0. {Reasons for keeping pets: 1. They liked the company. 2. They wanted children to have pets. 3. Dogs helped to guard the house.
